required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Muscle Memory After Treatment With Anabolic Substance Clenbuterol and Resistance Training in Humans
clinical_study.official_title: Muscle Memory After Treatment With Anabolic Substance Clenbuterol and Resistance Training in Humans: Myonuclear Addition, Hypertrophy and Myocellular Reprogramming

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the project is investigate muscle memory and underlying mechanisms in humans following resistance training and use of the anabolic substance clenbuterol.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change in fiber cross-sectional is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Immunohistochemistry to determine fiber cross-sectional area

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change in myonuclei is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Immunohistochemistry to determine number of myonuclei

primary_outcome.time_frame: The change in the muscle proteome is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Pathway enrichment analysis of the muscle proteome using mass-spectrometry based proteomics

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change in lean mass is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Lean mass assessed by dual X-ray absorptiometry (DXA)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change in maximal voluntary isometric contraction is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Maximal voluntary isometric contraction of m. quadriceps

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change in 1-repetition maximum is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
The change in sprint performance is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Work performed (W) during a sprint on a bicycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The change in satellite cells is assessed at baseline, 8, 24 and 32 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Immunohistochemistry to determine number of satellite cells

arm_group.description: Participants are randomized to daily ingestion of clenbuterol for a period of 8 weeks, with or without supervised resistance training.
Participants are randomized to daily ingestion of placebo for a period of 8 weeks, with or without supervised resistance training.

intervention.description: Participants ingest 80 micrograms clenbuterol daily during the initial 8-week period. This period is followed by a washout of 16 weeks with no drug and resistance training. Thereafter, an 8-week period with supervised resistance training is commenced, with no drug.

Participants ingest placebo tablets daily during the initial 8-week period. This period is followed by a washout of 16 weeks with no drug and resistance training. Thereafter, an 8-week period with supervised resistance training is commenced, with no drug.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and women
- BMI of <26 and normal ECG and blood pressure
Exclusion Criteria:
- Smoking
- Chronic disease,
- Use of prescription medication
- Pain due to current or previous musculoskeletal injury
- Resistance training more than once per week in the 12 months leading up to the intervention
- Current or previous use of prohibited anabolic substances
